glsa.title: KDE kimgio: PCX handling buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: KDE fails to properly validate input when handling PCX images, potentially resulting in the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: KDE is a feature-rich graphical desktop environment for Linux and Unix-like Operating Systems. kimgio is the KDE image handler provided by kdelibs.

description.p: kimgio fails to properly validate input when handling PCX files.

impact.p: By enticing a user to load a specially-crafted PCX image in a KDE application, an attacker could execute arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All kdelibs users should upgrade to the latest version:

references.uri: KDE Security Advisory: kimgio input validation errors
